headline: Tell HN: Levels.fyi is selling your salary data to companies for $1200/month
description:
https://www.levels.fyi/offerings/

https://i.imgur.com/eC3slkQ.png

This was surprising to me as I always thought of levels.fyi being oriented towards job seekers. I question how they can both sell salary data to companies and also offer salary negotiation coaching. Seems to me like these two customer groups want the exact opposite of the other.
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：Levels.fyi正在以1200美元/月的价格向公司出售你的工资数据
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：Levels.fyi正在以1200美元/月的價格向公司出售你的工資數據
description_zh-Hans:
https://www.levels.fyi/offerings/

https://i.imgur.com/eC3slkQ.png

这让我很吃惊，因为我一直认为level.fyi是面向求职者的。我质疑他们如何既能向公司出售薪酬数据，又能提供薪酬谈判辅导。在我看来，这两个客户群体的需求正好相反。
description_zh-Hant:
https://www.levels.fyi/offerings/

https://i.imgur.com/eC3slkQ.png

這讓我很吃驚，因為我一直認為level.fyi是面向求職者的。我質疑他們如何既能向公司出售薪酬數據，又能提供薪酬談判輔導。在我看來，這兩個客戶群體的需求正好相反。
